Conduit

A custom Minecraft server with plugin support written in NodeJS

About the project

Note: Conduit's development has been on hiatus since 2019. It may resume development in the future, but focus has been moved to other projects

Conduit is a custom Minecraft server with plugin support written in NodeJS. It currently only supports the Java Edition of Minecraft, but Bedrock Edition support is planned. It lacks many features at the moment but I would eventually like to make it a viable alternative to Java servers like Spigot and Paper
